verses.name: Joshua 18:21
verses.text: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Beth–hoglah, and the valley of Keziz,

verses.name: Joshua 18:22
verses.text: And Beth–arabah, and Zemaraim, and Beth–el,

verses.name: Joshua 18:23
verses.text: And Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,

verses.name: Joshua 18:24
verses.text: And Chephar–haammonai, and Ophni, and Gaba; twelve cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 18:26
verses.text: And Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,

verses.name: Joshua 18:27
verses.text: And Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,

verses.name: Joshua 18:28
verses.text: And Zelah, Eleph, and Jebusi, which is Jerusalem, Gibeath, and Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.
